homepageHeadingText: Unlock the Power of AI for Recruiting Best Talent
homepageSubHeadingText: Marcus is an AI-powered tool that helps you find the best talent around the world.
step-1-1: Start by logging in to your Mercor
step-2-2: For ex. 'I need a react developer'
step-2-3: Top talented developer will be displayed to you.
